results.definition: take the lead or initiative in; participate in the development of
examples: This South African surgeon pioneered heart transplants

results.definition: open up an area or prepare a way
examples: She pioneered a graduate program for women students

results.definition: someone who helps to open up a new line of research or technology or art
one of the first colonists or settlers in a new territory
examples: they went west as pioneers with only the possessions they could carry with them

results.definition: open up and explore a new area
